thread.title: L-com Releases New GPS/Cellular Antennas
thread.title_full: L-com Releases New GPS/Cellular Antennas - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: L-com Releases New GPS/Cellular Antennas
text:
L-com Global Connectivity, a preferred manufacturer of wired and wireless connectivity products, announced today it will now offer GPS/cellular antennas for use in mobile tracking applications.
NORTH ANDOVER, Mass.
L-com Global Connectivity, a preferred manufacturer of wired and wireless connectivity products, announced today it will now offer GPS/cellular antennas for use in mobile tracking applications.
L-com’s HyperLink® brand HG-PCGM01-03FJ and HG-PCGM01-03SM are small form factor, high-performance, combination GPS/cellular (3G/LTE) antennas that are designed for automatic vehicle locator and fleet tracking management systems. These systems are used in various industries including public safety, railroad, agriculture, utility, mass transit and defense.
“In today’s mobile economy, it is important to have the ability to track the movement and status of products and goods. Tracking systems deliver real-time information on the location, activity and inventory of vehicles to improve business performance and reduce costs,” said Ken Burgner, Product Manager. “They can also significantly aid recovery efforts in the event of theft. L-com’s HyperLink® brand HG-PCGM01-03 series GPS/cellular antennas are the key to these tracking systems.”
The antennas feature a penta-band cellular and high-LNA gain GPS antenna in one low-profile radome. The integral magnetic base ensures secure mounting to most metal structures. Designed to meet IP65 rating, the antenna’s radomes are manufactured from UV-resistant ABS to enable continuous reliable operation in the harshest of environments.
Inputs for these new antennas are accessed via two 3-meter leads, one for the cellular antenna and one for the GPS antenna. Standard models are terminated with either FAKRA Jack connectors or SMA connectors. Custom connectors are also available.
For more information about this release, please contact:
Peter McNeil, Marketing Manager
978-682-6936 x1174, mailto:pmcneil(at)l-com(dot)com
About L-com Global Connectivity
L-com Global Connectivity, a preferred manufacturer of wired and wireless connectivity products, offers a wide range of solutions and unrivaled customer service for the electronics and data communications industries. The company's product portfolio includes cable assemblies, connectors, adapters, computer networking components and custom products, as well as their HyperLink® brand of wireless products which include antennas, RF amplifiers, coaxial lightning and surge protectors, and NEMA rated enclosures. L-com's HyperLink® wireless products are designed for WiFi, WiMAX, SCADA, 802.11a/b/g/n/ac, RFID and Bluetooth applications. In addition to HyperLink® , L-com’s other brands include MilesTek®, specialists in Military/Aeronautics connectivity solutions and Aiconics®, a leading manufacturer of electrical connector products. Trusted for more than 30 years, L-com, which is headquartered in North Andover, Mass., is ISO 9001: 2008 certified and many of its products are UL® recognized. For more information, please visit: http://www.L-com.com/
